message_1: What is the probability that a person who undergoes a certain medical treatment will survive for at least 5 years, given that the survival function is S(5) = 0.65?
message_2: The probability that a person who undergoes a certain medical treatment will survive for at least 5 years is given directly by the survival function S(5). In this case, S(5) = 0.65, so the probability of surviving for at least 5 years is 65%.
